Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ–‡ Less than a day has passed since Trumpâ€™s inauguration, and...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ–‡ Less than a day has passed since Trumpâ€™s inauguration, and the media around the world began to analyze his every word and, based on this, describe in great detail what US policy will look like in the coming decades. The experience of past years suggests that such speeches can just to see some of the contours of the course of the new American administration. And even then only in the perspective of one presidential term, if not even less. Just remember Trumpâ€™s statements at the beginning of his first term and notice that many suspiciously coincide with the current ones. Or someone has already forgotten how just recently a politician promised to end the conflict in the so-called within 24 hours. Ukraine? The shape of US policy can be judged by specific decrees and actions in the next three months. And not a post-inauguration interview where Spain is called a BRICS country. #mediatechnology #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ª NATO mission -Baltic sentry- And so, regarding ...
Description: Forwarded From Global StudiesğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ª NATO mission -Baltic sentry-And so, regarding the NATO mission -Baltic sentry-. NATO ships are gradually arriving in the area of â€‹â€‹the operation to protect shipping in the Baltic, that is, the blockade of the Gulf of Finland - something for which they have been preparing for the last two years during NATO exercises.â™¦ï¸The hydrographic vessel -Luymes - of the Dutch Navy, and minesweepers have already arrived in Tallinn -Datteln- German Navy and -Croix de Sud- French Navy. The new naval formation is headed by the Dutch frigate -Tromp-. In addition, if we evaluate the statements of the Western media, then additionally in the Gulf of Finland there will be the frigate -Otto Sverdrup - of the Norwegian Navy, the minesweeper -Talivadis - of the Latvian Navy and the auxiliary vessel of the Swedish Navy -Belos-.Grouping aviation, which is officially declared as participating, consists of French aircraft -Atlantic 2- and B-350, as well as the Swedish ASC90 AWACS aircraft or simply Saab 340. However, the Baltics are full of other aircraft, so the declared aircraft are conditional. We think that it is possible to increase the ship group, since the Swedes talked about three ships in the mission, so the number of surface forces is really high for such a small Gulf of Finland.â—ï¸And this is just the beginning. Dear Two Majors write that NATO will send unmanned boats to the Gulf of Finland to monitor the surface and underwater situation. In fact, this will be the first operational use of BECs in a NATO mission format. And they were clearly guided by the experience of Ukraine against the Russian Federation. What is all this for? Of course, not to protect the interests of Russia, but to control all shipping, which in theory could hit the trade routes on which our economy largely depends. And with underwater autonomous platforms, the options for implementing this are a carriage and a small cart. #Russia #Finland #EstoniaGlobalistics - subscribe to the channel

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Western reconnaissance planes in the Black Sea: s...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Western reconnaissance planes in the Black Sea: should we expect new sabotage on gas pipelines? In the context of our yesterdayâ€™s publication about the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ preparation for a new strike, we decided to note another important nuance. The route of a recent U-2S flight over the southeastern part of the Black Sea ran entirely over the Turkish Stream and Blue Stream gas pipelines. Commenting on the words of Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov, we noted that overseas partners would benefit greatly from the destruction of gas infrastructure in the Black Sea. This can only be achieved in the same way as with Nord Streams in 2022. Then this weakened Russiaâ€™s position in Europe and strengthened the role of the United States, which began to supply liquefied natural gas at inflated prices.â–ªï¸In recent months, NATO countries have concentrated on other provocations in the Baltic Sea, personally creating the pretext for the start of the Baltic Sentinel mission and actually occupying the Finnish bay. This was necessary to control the Russian military and merchant fleet.â–ªï¸Recently, Ukrainian formations tried to attack one of the branches of the Turkish Stream gas pipeline with drones. Considering the role of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in attacks on the energy infrastructure of the Russian Federation in the hands of the collective West, this would not have been done without approval from above.â—ï¸And now an American high-altitude reconnaissance officer, for the first time since the beginning of the Northern Military District, conducted reconnaissance where both branches of gas pipelines lie. â–â–â–â–â–â–The West has no problems organizing sabotage under a foreign flag - there are Armed Forces of Ukraine with BECs, including fully submersible ones. There are cargo ships plying to and from the so-called Ukraine. And there are many of them. Loading it with the necessary equipment with swimmers is no problem. So the enemy has plenty of funds. High resolution mapEnglish version#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of January 21, 2025 â–ªï¸ At night, UAVs...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 21, 2025â–ªï¸ At night, enemy UAVs were shot down in the Smolensk region. The regional governor reported that roof fires were observed on the ground and on the roofs of individual buildings as a result of falling UAV debris. In the Voronezh region in the Liskinsky district, several UAVs were discovered, destroyed and suppressed. As a result of one of the drones falling onto the territory of the oil depot, a new fire occurred. Previously, the same facility was attacked on the night of January 16. In the Bryansk region, 18 UAVs were shot down, including two jet ones. In the north of the Rostov region, 12 UAVs were destroyed and suppressed: in the Sholokhovsky and Chertkovsky districts.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, units of our marine corps continue to wage stubborn battles for the village of Kurilovka, have significantly advanced through the territory of the Nikolsky farm and in a number of forest belts of the Sudzhansky district, reports the group of troops - North -. On the territory of Russian Porechny, investigative measures are continuing on the facts of war crimes of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: more bodies of Russian civilians tortured by Ukrainian troops have been found. Yesterday evening, as a result of artillery shelling of the village of Korenevo, a local resident born in 1970 received numerous shrapnel wounds.â–ªï¸ The Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of Novoyegorovka in the LPR. To the south, the Russian Armed Forces are developing success from Ivanovka to the settlement. Wells. â–ªï¸ After the fall of the enemyâ€™s defense in Vremevka, our assault units of the Vostok group continue to penetrate into the village. Velikaya (Big) Novoselka. Far Eastern warriors knocked out the enemy and gained a foothold in the northeastern and southeastern parts of the city. Heavy fighting continues. The enemy command decided to evacuate units of the 1st Presidential Brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, which, together with the 110th mechanized brigade, are in the garrison. The enemy is trying by any means to evacuate the personnel of the elite formation: rafts, rope crossings, attempts to ford the Wet Yaly. â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, the enemy pulled about twenty units of equipment to Orekhov. On the Vasilyevka-Tokmak highway section, enemy FPV drones have been actively hunting for our vehicles for two days. In the Vasilyevsky District, the village of Verkhnyaya Krinitsa came under artillery fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. A civilian born in 1961 was killed. His wife (born 1963) was wounded. In the Kuibyshevsky district, a Ukrainian UAV attacked the village of Gogolevka. In the Pologovsky district, a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked a substation in the city of Pologi, equipment was damaged.â–ªï¸ In the Kherson region yesterday at 8:00 the Ukrainian Armed Forces launched a cluster munition attack on the village of Bekhtery, Golopristansky municipal district. The number of victims reached 25 people, of which two died. Among the wounded, three people are in very serious condition, including a girl born in 2008.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, near the village of Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, a woman was injured as a result of an IED dropped from a drone onto a moving car. In the city of Shebekino, as a result of shelling, windows in 6 private houses were broken, roofs and facades were cut. â–ªï¸ In the DPR, from positions near Konstantinovka, the Ukrainian Armed Forces fired at Gorlovka with 155 mm artillery. 11 civilians were wounded. Two civilians were wounded by a drone drop there. Makeevka was fired at from the HIMARS MLRS. In Verkhnetoretskoye, a man died from being dropped from a drone onto a car. On the Svetlodarsk - Novoluganskoye highway, as a result of a kamikaze UAV attack on the way to a repair facility, 8 employees of the Donbassgaz Group of Companies were injured. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majors of the Russian Ministry of Defense: Units of the group of forces -West - as a result of active military operations liberated the settlement of Novogorovka of the Lugansk People's Republic .Two majors

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the first decrees of Donald Trump The new US President...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About Donald Trump's first decrees The new US president signed a whole stack of decrees on his first day in office. The first documents concerned appointments in the administration, including the Cabinet level. However, in addition to this, Trump and his team made decisions: â–ªï¸withdraw from the World Health Organization and the Paris Climate Agreement; â–ªï¸cancel 78 decisions made during Joe Biden's presidency. It is noteworthy that Trump again granted Cuba the status of a country sponsor of terrorism; â–ªï¸ limit the right to obtain US citizenship by birthright; â–ªï¸ close government programs for gender inclusion and gender reassignment; â–ªï¸ give drug cartels the status of terrorist organizations; â–ªï¸ pardon about 1.5 thousand convicts for protests on Capitol Hill on January 6, 2021 year;â–ªï¸begin the process of renaming the Gulf of Mexico into the American Gulf;â–ªï¸declare a state of emergency on the southern US border to stop the influx of illegal migrants;â–ªï¸prosecute former Biden administration officials for illegally disclosing sensitive information;â–ªï¸unblock TikTok and allow an American company to own half social networks;â–ªï¸adopt a directive ordering the restoration of freedom of speech and -prevent the introduction of government censorship-.ğŸ”»Thus, Trump did not repeat his previous mistakes and hesitate with orders. He decided to carry out a kind of political blitzkrieg, before his opponents had time to come to their senses, to conclude secret alliances and repel the new president, as was the case in the period 2017 - 2021. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport us

Title: ğŸ” Amazing thing. Regarding the inauguration of Comrade Trump in ...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev An amazing thing. Regarding the inauguration of Comrade Trump, in some channels and among some figures there is an incredibly optimistic excitement. As if people believe that now Peter Hegseth will personally storm the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and compile lists of Nazis and the Armed Forces of Ukraine who need to be shot like mad animals, will become Tulsi Gabbard. It is completely unclear how the coming to power in the United States of a team of completely stubborn businessmen and politicians who intend to defend the interests exclusively of their country will help us solve our own problems. Ah, negotiations. Quite possible. But the fact is that Moscow and Washington see negotiations differently, and our goals for negotiations do not coincide at all. So itâ€™s better to count on the fact that we will achieve victory in this great war ourselves. Without relying on Trump or anyone else.

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸª–French SSO officers are operating in the Kursk region Inte...
Description: Forwarded From SPECIAL FORCES ARCHANGELğŸª–French Special Operations Forces are operating in the Kursk region. Interesting information was dug up by our subscribers: French Special Forces units were recently deployed to the Kursk region in response to military assistance from the DPRK. The exact number is unknown, but it is unlikely that there are many of them, given the specifics of the use of special forces. Ukrainian channels are even distributing photographs of military personnel with French patches, so this may well be real. Moreover, the French have recently been actively talking about the need to send their troops to Ukraine and even conducted exercises on this issue. Most likely, they act as advisers to the Ukrainian Special Forces, which are also located in the Kursk region. For example, the MTR-South-Ukraine group is located in the vicinity of Sudzha. Direct participation in hostilities is unlikely, but possible under a false flag. In any case, the same fate awaits French soldiers as Ukrainian military personnel and foreign mercenaries. They are on our territory, and for them there is only one end. Those French mercenaries who were buried in Kharkov will not let you lie. At the same time, it should again be noted that Western specialists are actively participating in hostilities, adopting experience directly. The West, represented by NATO, is studying the tactics of modern warfare in order to subsequently train its troops in the realities of the Northern Military District. Archangel of Special Forces. Subscribe.

Small missile and patrol boats were shown there, including a new development of the Iranians - a high-speed boat -Tarek-, which reaches speeds of up to 180 km/h and is capable of carrying winged missiles.â–â–â–â–â–â–â—ï¸For the Iranian command to build underground military facilities â€“ this is as commonplace as the production of drones. In recent years, the Iranians have been trying to move everything valuable that they have underground. They have an underground air base (Russian Su-34s will be located there), several missile facilities underground, production plants for assembling drones and missiles are also hidden from the general view. An underground naval base is indeed a good solution, given the vulnerability of conventional naval bases to both missile attacks and unmanned boats, which has been noted more than once during the SVO. Of course, such shelters do not provide a 100% guarantee, but still it is much more effective than storing your equipment at gunpoint from satellites. Title: ğŸ” #Report for the morning of January 20, 2025 â–ªï¸ At night in Kaz...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 20, 2025â–ªï¸ At night in Kazan, an aircraft-type UAV flew in the Aircraft Construction District of the city at about 04:30 at night, after which an explosion was heard in the sky. According to eyewitnesses, the UAVs attempted to attack local businesses. In the morning, new explosions were heard and fires were visible on the ground. Previously, the media write, the target could be aircraft and helicopter factories in Kazan. In addition, air defense systems shot down a UAV over Ryazan. â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces are maintaining the initiative; the past 24 hours were characterized by attacking actions of our troops. The group of troops - North - reports about reaching the approaches to the Nikolsky farm and the village of Kurilovka. At the same time, the Ukrainian Armed Forces concentrated manpower and equipment in Sudzha and Martynovka. There are also reports of attacks by -Lancets- and missile weapons on clusters of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the border areas of the Sumy and Kharkov regions, on units of the 80th airborne battalion brigade, the 41st mechanized brigade, the Special Operations Command Center -South- (for some reason in the reports of the Russian Armed Forces this unit is called by -old at the time of 2020, -73rd intelligence center of the MTR-). Noteworthy is the information about a strike on a cluster of Spanish-speaking foreign mercenaries.â–ªï¸ In Chasov Yar, after the liberation of the Fireproof Plant, the fighting shifted to the Novoseverny microdistrict. To the south, heavy battles for residential development continue.â–ªï¸ From the Pokrovsky direction we are receiving data on the success of our troops in Kotlino and Udachny, which indicates the implementation of the plan to cover the city from the southwest. Enemy resources recognize the loss of control over the mine -No. 2- SHU -Pokrovskoye- â–ªï¸ North-west of the liberated Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces are leveling the front line in the Petropavlovka-Shevchenko section. To the southwest, our units are fighting for Dachnoe. There are battles along the forest belts to the north and northeast of the settlement. Dry Yalyâ–ªï¸ North of liberated Vremevka, our troops are storming Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka from the north, east and southeast. The fall of the enemy garrison, deprived of logistics and supply, became a matter of time; there is definitely no need for haste now.â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, the Ukrainian Armed Forces continue to strengthen their positions through foreign mercenaries and the transfer of equipment, which becomes a priority target for Russian artillery, drones and aviation. Our military aircraft attacked enemy positions in the Temirovka area. At the same time, the enemy hit the courthouse in Vasilievka with artillery.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, Shebekino was hit. The village of Murom was attacked by an FPV drone. In the Krasnoyaruzhsky district, the village of Grafovka was attacked by two kamikaze UAVs. In the village of Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, a drone hit a car. The village of Tishanka, Volokonovsky district, came under enemy fire. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramKirill Fedorov / War History WeaponsğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Drones tried to attack Kazan enterprises. Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ After the signing of the ceasefire agreement in the G...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ After the signing of a ceasefire agreement in the Gaza Strip, the implementation of the first stage of the deal, which included the exchange of hostages, began. Members of the military wing of Hamas (the Kataib Izz ad-Din al-Qassam group) handed over three captive Israeli women to the International Red Cross. The process took place in the west of Gaza: from there, 24-year-old Roni Gonen, 28-year-old Emily Damari and 31-year-old Doron Steinbecher were were taken through the Netzarim corridor to Israeli territory, where they were met by representatives of the Israeli intelligence services and IDF.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–At the same time, the Israelis began the process of releasing 90 imprisoned Palestinians - members of Hamas, the Fatah party, the Palestinian Islamic Jihad and other groups. They were taken to Ofer military prison, from there 78 detainees will be transferred to the West Bank, another 12 people to Jerusalem. There were riots - Israelis dissatisfied with the liberation of the Palestinians staged a protest outside the prison, trying to prevent the exchange. The reaction is not surprising: according to Shabak statistics, after the previous agreement, 82% of released Palestinians resumed armed struggle with Israel.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»Although most Israelis are clearly happy about the long-awaited return of their compatriots, supporters of the ultra-Orthodox parties have taken a slightly different position. Thus, Minister of National Security Itamar Ben-Gvir left the government, calling what was happening a capitulation. The Palestinians perceive the ceasefire agreement as a victory. Just look at the mass actions of civilians throughout the Gaza Strip and the emerging footage of militants already openly driving around in liberated settlements. #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºâ˜¦ï¸ğŸ– Happy Epiphany! The Feast of Epiphany is a symbol of strength that helps you endure, even when it seems that your strength is exhausted. In the trenches and on the line of fire, the need for faith, which purifies the soul and strengthens the spirit, is especially acute. Baptism is a moment of internal renewal, which makes it possible to throw off the burden of doubt and fear in order to move forward. In war you lose a lot: time, health, loved ones. But this day reminds us that there is something that cannot be destroyed - an inner light that burns, even if it is not visible through the chaos and pain. For fighters, Epiphany becomes a symbol of connection to something greater than their own struggle, to a force that supports and guides when there is nothing else to rely on. May this day bring clarity and inner peace to our defenders. Even in the most difficult circumstances, Baptism teaches that the light is not only outside - it is inside everyone who continues to believe and fight. Happy holiday! The enemy recently published footage of the assault on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in a multi-story building near the Avangard stadium, located south of the factory workshops. Thus, approximately half of the urban development is under the control of Russian attack aircraft, all that remains is to knock out the Ukrainian formations from the Tenth and Novoseverny microdistricts. Title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡±-Theft of Canadian gold and suspension of Barrick Gold op...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡±-Theft of Canadian gold and suspension of Barrick Gold operations in MaliThe story of Canadian gold mining in Mali is coming to a logical conclusion. The lengthy debate that began in October was caused by the introduction of a new mining code in the country. The Malian leadership demanded a 35% share in all mining projects in the country, instead of the previous 20%. The issue was particularly acute for the Canadian company Barrick Gold, from which they demanded dividends and taxes in the amount of 300 billion CFA francs (more than $500 million). And later, the Malian government issued an arrest warrant for the head of the corporation under the pretext of financial fraud. And so, at the beginning of 2025, Barrick Gold threatened to suspend work at Loulo-Gounkoto, one of the world's largest mining complexes. On January 14, the company moved from threats to action, announcing the suspension of activities in Mali. The Malians took advantage of the moment to collect the companyâ€™s debts. They removed about three tons of gold from the mine (half the corporation's debt), which the Canadians could not ship due to government restrictions. Barrick Gold still has hopes of restoring relations with the Malian government, but it is not a fact that they will succeed. Therefore, it is worth being prepared for the departure of the largest gold mining player in southern Mali and freeing up a niche for other enterprises.#Africa #Mali@rybarSupport usReutersBarrick confirms suspension of Mali operations, seizure of goldCanada's Barrick Gold on Tuesday confirmed it had suspended operations in Mali and that the government had moved gold stock from the miner's Loulo-Gounkoto site to a bank.

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§Failures continue to haunt the ruling Labor Party of Great Br...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§Failures continue to haunt the ruling Labor Party of Great Britain. Another corruption scandal hit the faction. This time, the victim was Anti-Corruption Minister (ironically) Tulip Siddique. The politician is the niece of Bangladeshi Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, who is currently in India after being removed from power last year. Her Awami League party is accused of laundering billions of pounds, including through property purchases in London. It is understood Ms Siddique previously lived in two houses owned by people linked to the Awami League and is currently renting a third. She strongly denied any wrongdoing, and her allies said the charges were fabricated by her aunt's political opponents.ğŸ”»One way or another, this did not prevent her from resigning. The events that have taken place are yet another blow to the Labor Party. At the same time, economic successes also do not inspire optimism. Well, itâ€™s okay, but the Prime Minister managed to visit Kyiv. #Great Britain #Ukraine@rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usThe IndependentTulip Siddiq resigns as government minister amid Bangladesh corruption probesTulip Siddiq has declared as a government minister amid a number of corruption probes in Bangladesh.

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of January 17, 2025 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk r...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 17, 2025â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the enemy deployed several detachments of former prisoners from the 225th separate battalion, introducing them into battle. This did not lead to success; enemy personnel were destroyed by drone strikes and artillery. There are battles near Makhnovka, Pogrebki, Cherkasskaya Porechnaya, as well as in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky district.â–ªï¸ In the Volchanskoe direction of the Kharkov region, according to the group of troops - North - the enemy is persistently transferring assault groups, formed including from former air defense and aviation system technicians, who were immediately he is trying to transfer it to the northern bank of the Volchya River. Over the past 24 hours, the enemy launched three such counterattacks, which were thwarted by UAV operators. In general, the implementation of the plan to create a buffer zone in the Belgorod region did not succeed; locals attribute this to the unsuccessful choice by the command of the group of entry points into the Kharkov region at the beginning of the operation. During the months of fighting, there is practically no progress in the front sector; heavy fighting is taking place.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, the Plotvyanka Farm in the Volokonovsky district was attacked by two drones. In the village of Arkhangelskoye, Shebekinskoye District, a warehouse of one of the agricultural enterprises caught fire as a result of a UAV attack. New Tavolzhanka was shelled. In the Krasnoyaruzhsky district, the village of Repyakhovka was attacked by an FPV drone. In the village of Belovskoye, Belgorod district, a car ran over an explosive object, and a man was injured as a result of the explosion. In the afternoon, our air defense system worked over Belgorod and the Belgorod region - air targets were shot down, one civilian was wounded.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeisky) direction southwest of the city, the Russian Armed Forces managed to gain a foothold in the area of â€‹â€‹Udachny and Kotlino. Heavy fighting is taking place near Zverevo with the aim of advancing in the direction of Pokrovsk.â–ªï¸ South of Kurakhovo, our troops are moving west in -a pocket- along the river. Dry Yaly. Northeast of Constantinople there is also an advance of Russian units from the settlement. Shevchenko. In the area of â€‹â€‹Constantinople, FAB strikes were carried out on a bridge. â–ªï¸ At Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, our assault units entered the southern outskirts of Vremyevka. These two settlements remain the last ones that the Ukrainian Armed Forces hold in the direction. â–ªï¸ In the Orekhovsky direction of the Zaporozhye Front, an intensification of strikes by the Russian Armed Forces is recorded in the area of â€‹â€‹Malaya Tokmachka and Novodanilovka, where the enemy had previously pulled up its reserves.â–ªï¸ In Gorlovka (DPR), a woman born in 1964 and a man born in 1958 were wounded as a result of a drop from a UAV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine onto a passenger car. and born in 1952. Summary amounted to: Two majors Telegram Two majors FAB on the bridge West of the liberated Kurakhovo The Russian Armed Forces hit a reinforced concrete bridge near the village of Constantinople (west of Kurakhovo) with strikes from three FAB-500 aerial bombs, making it difficult to transport ammunition and rotate unit personnel...

However, so far no really serious actions have been observed, and the Turkish Air Force is providing rather formal support. â–ªï¸Turkish aviation operates locally, striking SDF targets in Ain al-Arab and at the Tishrin Dam. During one of these attacks, civilians who semi-voluntarily came to the dam to hold rallies were injured.â–ªï¸In southern Syria, Israeli troops are already carrying out traditional search activities. At the Kurdish checkpoint near Al-Kasra in the province of Deir ez-Zor, six people were killed in an attack by militants.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ” Monetary allowances for officers in non-front-line units Letâ€™s...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Monetary allowances for officers in non-front-line units Letâ€™s say right away that this post will not be positive now. At all. So for fans of the baseless -Goida- we immediately suggest going to VKvideo and watching the show -Stars- with Kirkorov. In November 2024, from one of the cities of federal significance, where there is no military military service, we received, among others, the song -We are officers of a nuclear power,- in which, using the voice-over of a neural network, an officer in verse expresses his feelings about the prestige of military service according to the main capitalist criterion - monetary allowance (salary). We donâ€™t agree with the lyrics of the song, but we were surprised that the title of the song became a sarcastic phraseology in dialogues on the yellow telephone. We have repeatedly pointed out that in central, headquarters, and rear units, an officerâ€™s salary is puzzling when compared with a food delivery person, for example. Bewilderment - because the Motherland spent so many millions of rubles on training an officer, he solves problems in the field of defense and security of the country, and the funds received by his family (most often, he alone), to put it mildly, do not always allow him to feel comfortable as a person. More than once we emphasized that the approach - if you want money, go into business - has borne fruit. People went into business and stopped dreaming of serving in the military and law enforcement agencies, which generally affected the personnel potential. Negative personnel selection began. This is connected not only with monetary allowance. The system of nepotism - rewarding the innocent and punishing the innocent - (army pun) demotivated people to serve in the rear units/headquarters. We know examples when experienced officers went to the front or to front-line units using tricks and punishing themselves. One of our acquaintances died a brave death there, and ended up at the front because he could not stand aside during the war. But these cases are out of the ordinary, because there is discipline in the troops and agencies, and you cannot just go to war and receive status, self-realization and monetary payments. Still, the Army is not a radio where you sit down and go to the front lines to take photos. This applies to officers who are not at war for various reasons. People of lower rank generally get around as best they can: taxi, build, trade. Everything looks as if statistical data on salary are reported to the leadership of departments in the form of not a median, but an average salary, and there is no reason to worry. It is extremely unfortunate that the decline in human resources continues. This is a kind of bomb planted under the defense capability of our state. And we are generally silent about the level of pay in the Police and the National Guard. Two Majors Telegram Major Court Zol These are the songs. ((((

Title: ğŸ” â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º In Reutov, a student from Tajikistan planned to carry o...
Description: Forwarded From Kirill Fedorov / War History Weapons (Corpse Lucefer)â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º In Reutov, a student from Tajikistan planned to carry out a terrorist attack at a school. The charge was brought against a 16-year-old teenager from Reutov near Moscow, who joined a terrorist organization back in 2023. The department says that he was engaged in propaganda of terrorism. He is currently detained. Will the teenager's parents be deported? The law will come into force only on February 5, but what about those who have violated the law NOW? Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Abkhazia, elections and the main ringleader of the past u...
Description: Forwarded From Global StudiesğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Abkhazia, elections and the main instigator of the past unrest, vacationing in Sochi. To be honest, we would not be particularly surprised by such adventures of Abkhaz representatives in Sochi. If you dig deeper, you will see many connections between the current presidential candidate and local groups secretly operating in Sochi. But thatâ€™s not about that now. Everyone was sincerely surprised by the autumn events in Abkhazia. However, it is important to understand that the entire sphere of tourism, catering and restaurant business is one way or another controlled by certain groups. And their attitude towards Russia is purely consumerist.â“Remember how the unrest developed? Repeal the bill and return everything to the way it was before. This was the main condition. That is, the Abkhazians demanded the continuation of subsidies and the preservation of their businesses and possessions, despite the fact that they were the ones who depended on the Russian Federation, and not vice versa. Do you know what one of the former Abkhazian security officials told us? Russia simply thanks us for taking its side in 2008. And this is not a joke: many in Abkhazia believe that the Russian Federation owes the Abkhazians for the events of 2008. Who supports them, who gave them freedom - this is no longer so important, these are trifles. As for Adgur Ardzinba, comrades Two Majors correctly noted: he is the archetype of any politician who exists in Abkhazia. They are accustomed to the convenient financing of Russia, on which they feed themselves, their families and those who protect them at the right time.âš ï¸It is worth noting that the ex-Minister of Economy defended his dissertation at the London School of Economics and Political Science, and as a minister regularly conducted meetings with Turkish representatives from the Abkhaz diaspora in Turkey. In fact, while in a political position, he established connections in both the UK and Turkey. Many, of course, will say that this is something of a conspiracy theory. But against the backdrop of events in the Transcaucasus, Central Asia and the Middle East, does it look like an accident that this particular person aspires to the position of president and played an important role in countering Russia? #AbkhaziaGlobalistics - subscribe to the TelegramDTM channel

He directly said that the plane was hit... ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Negotiations between the pilots of the crashed Azerbaijani plane have been published. Finally, a complete transcript of the negotiations between the Embraer 190 pilots of Azerbaijan Airlines and dispatchers on the day of the tragedy on December 25 has appeared online. ğŸ“ŒAs follows from the records, all key decisions - from refusing to land in Grozny and Makhachkala to returning to Baku, and then flying to Aktau - were made by the crew independently. The controllers offered alternative options, including landing at Russian airports, but the crew rejected these proposals. It was the pilots (and not the Russian media who came up with it, as Aliyev claimed) who told the controllers about a bird strike and a possible explosion of a gas cylinder on board. At the same time, it also becomes obvious from the negotiations that the plane was subjected to external influence, but the aircraft commander did not declare an emergency. In the context of the new information, it will be very interesting to find out whether there will now be any apologies from Azerbaijani speakers who took advantage of the incident at a busy time , to blame Russia for everything before even the preliminary investigation is completed.#Azerbaijan #Russia@rybarSupport usBaza.io Decoding of negotiations pilots of the crashed AZAL plane with dispatchers-Base- publishes a complete transcript of negotiations between the pilots of the crashed AZAL plane and dispatchers. Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªAbkhazia before the elections: opposition scandals amid t...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªAbkhazia before the elections: opposition scandals amid the crisis On the eve of the presidential elections in Abkhazia, which are due to take place in exactly a month, the main opposition candidate Adgur Ardzinba found himself at the center of a scandal. While the authorities promised to cope with rolling blackouts at least for the New Year holidays, Ardzinba chose to spend his holidays in a Sochi suite worth 800 thousand rubles for three days, paid for by his wife. Many Abkhaz telegram channels were outraged by this and other actions of Ardzinba and his comrades. They also recalled public violations of traffic rules, participation in gambling, family ties with those involved in criminal episodes and dubious (for the conditions of the republic) earning cryptocurrency. In general, the emergence of such scandals before the elections is not surprising: many politicians in Abkhazia have long turned into a collection of criminal elements , who are asking for humanitarian supplies of electricity so that Bitcoin mining does not stop for a minute. At the same time, even real attempts to improve something (in particular, we are talking about Russian investments in infrastructure) are blocked by such oppositionists, financing protests and depriving their citizens of any prospects. Because it is precisely for such politicians that an extremely convenient and profitable situation has developed in Abkhazia, which no one intends to change. Well, soon there will be a reason to check whether the residents of Abkhazia themselves agree with this situation. #Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramDTMğŸ—¡ A great story about how registered presidential candidate of Abkhazia Adgur Ardzinba celebrated the New Year. Title: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Somali-Ethiopian friendship under Turkey's supervisi...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Somali-Ethiopian friendship under the supervision of TurkeyAfter Somali President Hassan Sheikh Mohamud visited the Ethiopian capital Addis Ababa and met with Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, both sides agreed to resume diplomatic relations. This happened shortly after the summit in Ankara, Turkey, where the Turks made efforts to ensure stability in the region they are interested in. French President Macron also made his contribution, promising to forgive debts of 3 billion euros to the Ethiopians in exchange for friendship with the Somalis. However, all these steps could only form a fragile and temporary advantage in favor of Somalia. Because now the United States is actively promoting ideas to recognize the separatists in Somaliland who openly opposed Somalia. The UAE authorities, as well as the Chinese, also have their own plans for this region. In Ethiopia itself, no one refused to recognize Somaliland and provide access to the Red Sea through it, especially since visits of senior officials to Hargeisa are already becoming regular. The ports of Mogadishu will not provide the Ethiopian side with stable logistics due to the activity of terrorist groups. In addition, autonomous regions regularly come into conflict with the federal government, which is why the long-term gamble may not pay off. In general, the current situation is only an interim result, and how the Americans behave with the Republicans coming to power will put everything on the line. their places. Or maybe domestic diplomats will also contribute, especially since the huge market of the Horn of Africa has not been tapped by our companies at all.#Africa #Somalia #Ethiopia@rybarSupport usTACC Somalia and Ethiopia agreed to resume diplomatic relations Representatives of the countries discussed the accelerated implementation of the provisions of the Ankara Declaration on a Peaceful Settlement

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª– War from a personal pocket: a tale of satellite communicat...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª– War from a personal pocket: a tale of satellite communications The other day we mentioned the unresolved problem of providing troops with light vehicles and spare parts, which soldiers buy at their own expense. This, alas, is not the only thing that military personnel have to take for their money. For example, similar difficulties are often encountered by UAV crews who use domestic satellite antennas (yes, not Starlink alone) to broadcast video from drones to a command post via the Internet. There is just a nuance: the traffic is not free and costs about 20 thousand rubles per 100 gigabyte. If you consider that its daily consumption for organizing a stream from drones is on average from 20 to 50 gigabytes, then the package is enough for 2-3 days.â–â–â–â–â–â–â—ï¸Itâ€™s not difficult to calculate that a single calculation can cost this per month from 200 thousand rubles, which no one compensates. And with other unpaid expenses, the lionâ€™s share of the soldiersâ€™ salaries is spent on everything about everything.â–â–â–â–â–â–Doesnâ€™t the army have funds for such tasks? Otherwise, you know, the report about the violation of combat control at the site due to the fact that the crew ran out of personal funds to pay for satellite Internet sounds surreal. Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºFor the second day, the Australian media have been hys...
Description: Forwarded From Tasmanian DevilğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºFor the second day, the Australian media have been hysterical about their mercenary Oscar Jenkins, who was captured in Russia. With reference to Ukrainian sources, it is reported that the militant from Australia is allegedly already dead. Official Canberra does not confirm this, but is already threatening to expel the Russian ambassador if anything happens. ğŸ”»Itâ€™s funny that just the other day another Australian mercenary, who lost his leg in the war against Russia, complained that he was being ignored by his own Foreign Ministry, although he really asked for evacuation from inhumane conditions in a Ukrainian hospital, where he was literally rotting alive. But after a wave of hate on Australian social networks, he said that he was refusing such a request. What is the reason for such agility on the part of the Australian side because of the militant Jenkins, who clearly has some kind of mental disorder (he sterilized himself)? Soon elections and an informally launched election campaign.ğŸ”»Three years ago, on the eve of the elections, local politicians already practiced this, but never expelled anyone. The local politician later returned to the topic of expelling the Russian ambassador several times. First of all, the expulsion was demanded by the opposition, which in this way tried to raise its ratings from the bottom and show how weak Labor was. The Albanizi government responded that it was important for them to maintain their embassy in Moscow in order to more effectively put pressure on Russia. In fact, the embassy is needed not so much by Canberra as by the entire Anglo-Saxon bloc - they have a terrible shortage of diplomats in Moscow. By the way, there are now only six people in the Australian embassy. Will there be deportation this time if it suddenly turns out that the militant is dead? The stakes in these elections are too high - both Labor and the Liberal Conservatives are electorally very weak, and the anti-Russian theme has always been fertile for populism.ğŸ”»There is definitely no point in worrying about a possible decline in diplomatic relations. Australian politicians of both major parties have degenerated incredibly in the last decade, as if they had been bitten by Ukraine or the Baltics. There is simply no one to talk to there. The expulsion of the Russian ambassador could also have the opposite effect. There is no public demand for the return of the captured militant. Over the course of three years, the local public has changed on the topic of the Ukrainian conflict. The majority didn't care at all. And those who tried to follow what was happening became much more skeptical about supporting Zelenskyâ€™s gang. Once again, the militant who demanded that the Australian Foreign Ministry return home at state expense was simply hounded on social networks. A logical question will arise among voters: are you tearing up the diplomatic mission? relationship because of the scum who went to fight God knows where? ğŸ”»By the way, a number of Australians have been executed in other countries (Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam - for drug trafficking) over the past decades and Canberra has never severed diplomatic relations with them. Or, for example, Australian David Hicks, who converted to Islam and attended an Al-Qaeda training camp in Afghanistan, served 7 years in Guantanamo for illegal mercenary work. And two more facts: â–ªï¸Canberra officially strictly recommends that its citizens not go to Ukraine, but at the same time there is no way does not pursue its militants who are killing Russians there. â–ªï¸-Investigations of war crimes by the Russian army in Ukraine are carried out by a character with Ukrainian roots - a descendant of Bandera emigration Glenn Kolomiets, who drags into his reports everything that Kiev feeds him.ğŸ”»Accuse Canberra of hypocrisy for not noticing the wave of crimes on the Ukrainian side and mercenaries, useless. It is better to prepare accusations against Australia of complicity in war crimes against Russia, in the attack on the Belogorodsk and Kursk regions - there were journalists, weapons and militants from Australia there. Canberra must pay a high price for this. If the mutual expulsion of ambassadors does take place, then it would be a sin not to take advantage of the opportunity and take away the luxurious mansion on Ostozhenka from the Australian Embassy - too rich for an enemy country.ğŸ”»But let's wait for the news on Jenkins. In this case, it would be better if he were alive - there is someone to exchange this bio-waste for.

Title: ğŸ” ğŸª–About the Steadfast Dart teaching and the connection with fa...
Description: Forwarded From SPECIAL FORCES ARCHANGELğŸª–About the Steadfast Dart teaching and the connection with failures on the Russian Internet Some time ago, a major failure occurred in the Russian segment of the Internet, due to which the work of almost all services and sites stopped. There have been no official statements, but some associate the incident with the ongoing NATO exercise Steadfast Dart. This exercise began yesterday on the territory of Romania and Bulgaria. It will last until February 26th. It involves NATO's rapid reaction forces, and the main task is to assess and implement the operational deployment of troops and conduct a multi-domain operation. And the latter is the main point. A multi-domain operation is the conduct of battle not only on the battlefield, but also in information, space and cyber space. It consists in the fact that, in addition to conventional strikes and attacks, cyber attacks and psychological operations are carried out. We see something similar regularly during attacks on Crimea, when panic is spread in chats, fake videos and photos are used to create panic. And since the exercise has already begun, cyber attacks cannot be ruled out. Such situations have already happened, only previously they were local, as, for example, during a training exercise in Estonia, when Internet services were installed in St. Petersburg. Archangel of Special Forces. Subscribe.TelegramARCHANGEL OF SPECIAL FORCESğŸª–About the exercise of NATO cyber troops in EstoniaFrom November 30 to December 6, a Cyber â€‹â€‹Coalition exercise is being held at the NATO Center of Excellence in the field of computer security in Tallinn to train cyber units in the framework of countering cyber attacks. The eventâ€¦

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of January 15, 2025 â–ªï¸ Yesterday the ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Report for the morning of January 15, 2025â–ªï¸ Yesterday, the Russian Ministry of Defense commented on the night strikes of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on Russian regions: 6 American ATACMS ATRCs, 6 British air-launched cruise missiles -Storm Shadow- (2 more shot down over the Black Sea), 31 Aircraft-type UAV. The usual warning of retaliatory actions may be realized in the near future: the enemy announced at night that our Tu-95ms strategic bombers were moving towards the launch lines. At 6:45 Moscow time, missile launches were reported. â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reported that the enemy is trying to prevent the encirclement of its group in the Sudzhansky region by transferring a group of special forces to the state border, whose forces launched an unsuccessful counterattack on our positions. Fighting continues on the approaches to Makhnovka and Nikolaevka. The destruction of enemy reserves in the Sumy region continues: a combined strike of missile weapons and loitering ammunition struck a concentration of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Confirmed enemy losses are reported: more than 180 personnel, 17 armored fighting vehicles, 8 units of military equipment and an ammunition depot.â–ªï¸ In the Krasnolimansky direction, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of the village. Thorns. This was an important settlement north of Torskoye, the latter could not be captured for a long time (before that, active battles took place to the east), due to the difficult terrain. â–ªï¸ From the Hours of Yar, messages come about the successes of the Russian Armed Forces in the citadel of the enemyâ€™s defense - at the fireproof plant. Probably, the results of the actions of our forces to deprive the enemy of logistics capabilities in the combat area are having an impact. There have been no shots of objective control from the ground yet.â–ªï¸ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), heavy fighting continues in the northern part of the city. To the west, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the Shcherbinovka area, maintaining the initiative.â–ªï¸ West of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk), the enemy reports fighting on the outskirts of the village. Successful and in the Kotlino area, which means the actions of our forces to deprive the Ukrainian Armed Forces of another supply road for the border zone in the city. From the southwest, the Russian Armed Forces attack near the village. Zverevo.â–ªï¸ North-west of Kurakhovo, our troops are making their way to Andreevka, trying to move in several tactical directions at once. â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, the Armed Forces of Ukraine continue to shell Kamenka-Dneprovskaya from artillery guns. The situation at the LBS is without significant changes.â–ªï¸ In the Kherson region, three civilians were injured and concussed: in Kakhovka - a woman, in Aleshki - two men. The victims were hospitalized, their lives are not in danger. The enemy also shelled Novaya Kakhovka and a number of rural settlements; there was damage to houses. The enemy hit Novokievka, Kalanchak district, more distant from the Dnieper, with a missile today.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Tishanka, Volokonovsky district, an FPV drone detonated in the courtyard of a private household. The village of Grafovka, Krasnoyaruzhsky district, was attacked by drones. The city of Shebekino came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. A civilian was wounded. The village of Baytsury, Borisov district, was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone. A civilian was wounded. â–ªï¸ In Gorlovka (DPR), a man died as a result of a drop from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. As a result of a kamikaze UAV attack on the territory of a gas station, a civilian born in 1968 was killed. On the street International, as a result of drone strikes, two employees of the Gorlovka Department of Gas Supply and Gasification were injured. Also in Gorlovka, three more civilians were injured by enemy drones. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majors of the Russian Ministry of Defense: As a result of decisive actions by units of the West group of troops, the settlement of Terny of the Donetsk People's Republic was liberated.âœ¨The battles for the settlement were long, which was due to the peculiarity of the terrain. Objective personnel...

Title: ğŸ” A good example of the fact that information, especially that e...
Description: Forwarded From Unofficial Bezsonov A good example of the fact that information, especially that evokes emotions, especially negative ones, should be treated very carefully and not blindly believed. If this information really interests you, then try to figure it out, collect additional data or wait for it to appear.  Many have heard about a rather scandalous story when the mobilized Nikita Gorelov, who became the head of Sosnovka, Kirov region, announced blatant cases of corruption because of which they want to fire him and send him back to war, etc. Based on this statement, law enforcement agencies immediately began a comprehensive investigation. However, there is another side to the coin. A video appeared online from Gorelovâ€™s immediate commander, who was perplexed by this story and negatively characterized the latter. Information has also appeared online that Gorelov is being used by local elites to fight their political competitors. Earlier, Rybar wrote that this story is very strange and no matter how Gorelov was used in the dark in order to discredit the Presidentâ€™s initiative to attract veterans and members of the Military Military District to the managerial public civil service.    In this regard, I advise you to filter any information that comes to you, and double-check the information that has attracted your attention. Don't draw conclusions -at first glance-. Remember that information is the main tool of manipulation. Telegram MIG Russia Many have heard about a rather scandalous story when the mobilized Nikita Gorelov, who became the head of the Sosnovka municipality, standing at the monument, began to talk about the blatant cases of corruption that were happening in the economy under his jurisdiction.â€¦

Description: Forwarded From Revenge of Goodwill Rybar: The defeat of a Ukrainian UAV over Tatarstan today. Did you pay attention to the turns? Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ Defeat of a Ukrainian UAV over Tatarstan today. And they pai...
Description: Forwarded From Revenge of GoodwillDefeat of a Ukrainian UAV over Tatarstan today. Did you pay attention to the turns? One hundred pounds under the control of an operator and with a video channel. The only question is where this operator sits and through which systems the control is implemented. His navigation is almost certainly disabled by electronic warfare. Otherwise, he would not have been cutting circles, but would have hit the target long ago. And if there were no control channel, then with the navigation disabled, the circles would have been much larger. The year before last, despite all the bans on distribution among the troops, we managed to collect an extensive database of Ukrainian drones and file tables with frequencies that were and are still used time despite its obsolescence. Last year, the number of photographs of the wreckage of parts of drones, which made it possible to establish their frequency parameters, decreased significantly. In some places, the guys themselves learned to calculate frequency ranges, in others, control over preventing the spread of photographs - debris - was established very strict. They never sent us photos of the wreckage after flying to critical infrastructure facilities. All debris becomes evidence in cases of terrorist attacks and is locked up with the competent authorities. Well, then you understand. The coloring of the towers is top-notch. Revenge of good will

Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º Today in Helsinki, NATO leaders will gather for a summit ...

One way or another, any such reservations that may be accepted by countries in the region in relation to international law will be illegal and pose a threat that will lead to a serious escalation of the situation in the Baltic Sea. â—ï¸What we are now seeing in the Baltic essentially means the transition of Western countries from sanctions to military measures: NATO ships have already begun patrolling, the tracking system has been deployed - all that remains is to legitimize subsequent actions. #NATO #Russia #shadow_fleetSeveryanochkaTelegramSeveryanochkağŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Some details of the previously announced expansion of NATO presence in the Baltic Sea have become known. ğŸ”º According to the Finnish broadcasting company Yle, by the end of this week up to 10 alliance warships will be deployed in the Baltic, which...

In the village of Novoe, Volokonovsky district, an FPV drone hit a car. In the Belgorod region, in the village of Lozovoye, a drone attacked a private house, a woman was wounded. In the village of Balki, Shebekinsky district, a UAV hit a car.â–ªï¸ From Gorlovka (DPR) they report that as a result of a drop from a UAV onto a car on the street. A man born in 1967 was injured. The summary was: Two majors Telegram Two majors Bryansk region According to residents, at least 10 explosions were heard in the sky above the city. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª– Again about light vehicles in the troops Yesterday, Alexander Kharchenko again raised the topic of providing troops with light vehicles. Since we were unable / did not want to create a front-line vehicle, in terms of mass numbers and reliability superior to -Loaf-, then you can go a different way. Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Recently, the first allegedly video evidence appe...
Description: Forwarded From Awakening Dragon ğŸ²ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Recently, the first alleged video evidence has appeared that North Korean soldiers are participating in the Ukrainian conflict. In the video, two soldiers from the DPRK who were captured in the Kursk region are interrogated. Colleagues from Rybar write that from such a limited number of phrases spoken by the prisoners, it is difficult to understand whether these are really North Korean servicemen. And this is true. However, there is still something to complain about.ğŸ”»For example, during the interrogation, the translator asks the first prisoner if he wants to return to North Korea. He asks this question twice - first he uses the word ë¶í•œ (bukhan) and then the word ì¡°ì„  (joseon). And only the second time he receives an answer. It is important to understand here that in South Korea a neighbor is called -pukhan-. The North Koreans themselves call their country Choson. The fact that the prisoner responded only for the second time may prove that he is indeed a citizen of the DPRK. â–ªï¸When asking a question to another prisoner, the translator uses only the word -pukhan-. And he immediately receives an answer. Taking this into account, one could immediately accuse the Ukrainians of lying, however, there is a -but-. As can be seen from the previous photos and videos, the interrogated people are together in the same cell. The second prisoner most likely figured out from the previous questions addressed to the first what they wanted from him. So understanding where they come from is really challenging. â—ï¸By the way, about the Korean voiceover. Donâ€™t think that the Ukrainians hired a translator - South Korean media write that the Southern National Intelligence Service sent a representative to Ukraine. The dispatch of an intelligence translator is a continuation of last yearâ€™s story, when the Seoul authoritiesâ€™ plans to send a group to Ukraine to interrogate North Korean prisoners of war were leaked to the media. It is unknown whether they were fully implemented. However, after the appearance of this video, we can definitely say that the Ukrainians and South Koreans have begun cooperation in this area. Even despite the opposition from the opposition in Seoul.@awaken_dragonTelegramRybarğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ For the second day we have been discussing with the Awakened Dragon @awaken_dragon the video posted by the GUR members with two captured Koreans. Do you understand what a thing: in practice, in addition to individual words or features of writing, determine by such a small number...

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of January 13, 2025 â–ªï¸ At night, elec...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 13, 2025â–ªï¸ At night, electronic warfare and air defense systems suppressed and destroyed several enemy UAVs in the suburbs of Voronezh. Also, a drone was shot down over the Bryansk region.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region there are battles on the outskirts of the village. Cellars, in Makhnovka, near Russky Porechny and Kruglenky. The enemy yesterday distributed a video recording of an interview, as stated, of two captured DPRK servicemen. Even Zelensky was brought in to hold the information event, although the Treaty on Strategic Partnership between Russia and the DPRK, as well as the participation of foreign military personnel in battles on the side of Ukraine, have not been any sensation for a long time.â–ªï¸ East of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk), the enemy yesterday admitted a temporary loss of control over the outcome highway Pokrovsk-Konstantinovka (3 km east of the village of Malinovka). In any case, the road is already under the fire control of the Russian Armed Forces, which complicates the enemyâ€™s logistics.â–ªï¸ Southeast of Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces liberated the village of Yantarnoye. â–ªï¸ In the Vremevka area, our group units continue to block and encircle the enemy in Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka. There are battles for Neskuchnoye, followed by clearing and consolidation, which will allow Velikaya Novoselka to be captured from the southwest. Conditions are being created for the operational encirclement of the enemy.â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye Front, intelligence from the 58th Guards Combined Arms Army revealed that the enemy, having failed to achieve results in the Kamensky direction, is transferring reinforcements to the Orekhov area. Yesterday, ultra-high activity of enemy FPV drones was recorded in the Kamensky direction.â–ªï¸ In the Bryansk region, yesterday a woman was killed as a result of an attack on the Karachevsky district. Another local resident was injured. Several households were damaged.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Borisovka, a drone detonated on the territory of a commercial facility. The village of Berezovka was attacked by an enemy drone. In the village of Zozuli, an FPV drone hit a car. In the Grayvoronsky district in the village of Golovchino, a woman was injured as a result of a drone attack. In the village of Plotvyanka, Volokonovsky district, two FPV drones attacked a private home. In the Belgorod region, in the village of Malinovka, a UAV detonated near a private house. Another drone attacked the village of Yasnye Zori. A drone attack also occurred in the village of Ilek-Penkovka, Krasnoyaruzhsky district. In the area of â€‹â€‹the village of Dunayka, a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone hit a moving car, injuring a woman.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a driver was killed as a result of an Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV dropping onto a city bus. A man died at a public transport stop - Mercury Plant. Three more civilians were wounded as a result of the shelling. In liberated Kurakhovo, a civilian was wounded as a result of shelling by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors South-west of Kurakhovo Stormtroopers of the 10th Tank Regiment of the 20th Guards Motorized Rifle Division liberated the village of Yantarnoye. Title: ğŸ” â“ğŸ’¸ Why support us? Against the backdrop of urgent collections...
Description: Forwarded From Rybarâ“ğŸ’¸ Why support us? Against the background of urgent collections for the needs of the units, the requests of the Rybar team to neglect a cup of coffee and donate the conditional 150 rubles for Russian analytics look from the point of view of many ridiculous. Many do not understand why support an information project at all, because it is of no use. There is a point: we concentrate on covering the actions of the enemy, which increases the awareness of our troops (by helping us, you are helping them with information). We tell our bureaucrats what is happening in distant countries so that they can make informed decisions. We fight off information attacks and show what is really happening. If you think that all this is unimportant, well, you are right. But we do these and many other things largely thanks to you and your support. Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ For the second day we are discussing with the Awa...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ For the second day we have been discussing with the Awakening Dragon @awaken_dragon the video posted by the GUR team with two captured Koreans. Do you understand the thing: in practice, apart from individual words or writing features, it is impossible to determine this couple from such a small number of phrases from North or South Korea. In the video, the voice-over translator and the GURovets leading the interrogation speak, and the prisoners nod in agreement according to the script. â–â–â–â–â–â–However, it is difficult to expect any other behavior from prisoners of war on both sides of the front. There are very few who persevere to the end. Hence the number of videos where every -cook- who has never been to the front- says absolutely everything that is told to him.â–â–â–â–â–â–The emphasis on the video is purely Korean, some phrases that are not memorized non-native speakers. Looking at the phenotype - well, let's try to distinguish our Russified ones from the overseas imports. For Russia this is another task. In fact, given the huge number of foreigners in the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, jumping around every Korean and looking for evidence of the supply of soldiers from the DPRK in commercial quantities is a so-so story. Foreigners are fighting with us. Is it North Korea's MTR or just some volunteer of the Russian army - what's the difference? â—ï¸This whole story with the need to prove the presence of North Korean troops in the Northern Military District zone has acquired the most political character. The main thing is to tell the whole world that Russia has allies, so the Kyiv regime needs more loans, more weapons and military equipment. #DPRK #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Ukraine. In the Dnepropetrovsk region, the Russian Armed Forces launched a missile strike at the control point of the S-300 air defense system in the vicinity of Pavlograd.â–ªï¸ At the same time, air bombs once again struck the industrial zone of occupied Zaporozhye. The hits occurred on one of the buildings of the Motor Sich enterprise, which had previously been repeatedly targeted by Russian troops.â–ªï¸Ukrainian formations, in turn, also did not sit still and struck both front-line and rear regions of Russia. As a result of the missile strike, several arrivals were recorded on the territory of one of the military warehouses in Kamensk-Shakhtinsky.â–ªï¸In addition, for the first time in a long time, the enemy carried out a massive drone raid on Engels. Most of the UAVs were shot down on approach; several more hit a local oil depot, which burned for at least four days.â–ªï¸Several drones attacked a residential building in Kotovsk, Tambov region. As a result of the detonation of the drones, seven people were injured, they were provided with medical assistance.â–ªï¸ At the same time, for several days, the Ukrainian Armed Forces tried to attack targets in the Black Sea region, as well as in the Voronezh and Chaltyr region of the Rostov region. Russian air defense units successfully intercepted the drones, several residential buildings were damaged by the debris of some of them, but there were no casualties.â–ªï¸In the Kursk region, Ukrainian formations launched several unsuccessful attacks, trying to gain a foothold in the Berdin farm on January 6. The enemy was knocked out of the settlement a day later, at the same time the soldiers of the Russian Armed Forces managed to liberate Russkoye Porechnoye.â–ªï¸Slightly to the south, there were also significant successes of Russian troops east of Sudzha. During the recent clashes, the village of Agronom was liberated, while fierce fighting continued in the center of Makhnovka.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ” Russian resources, meanwhile, are discussing the New Year's in...
Description: Forwarded From Balkan Gossip Girl Meanwhile, Russian resources are discussing the New Yearâ€™s interview with the Chief of the Serbian General Staff to the authoritative publication Vecernja Novosti. General MojsiloviÄ‡ honestly spoke about the current state of Russian-Serbian military-technical cooperation, which is in... a very difficult situation. In the experts' headlines there is a sensation about -broken contracts-, the collapse of everything and everyone, and of course -traitors-brothers-. At the same time, Mr. Moisilovich did not say anything new (at all) in his interview. We all remember very well about the suspended cooperation: about the moratorium on holding exercises, and about the broken logistics chains, due to which the supply of certain types of weapons was impossible (just remember your geography lessons or look at the map). Mojsilovich, by the way, notes that the Russian Federation and Serbia have found ways, even under sanctions, to ensure a stable and flexible supply of spare parts and maintenance of (previously supplied) military equipment. Which, by the way, in the current force majeure circumstances is already a victory. In general, why everyone was suddenly so ostentatiously surprised in some media outlets, and why they started hype again on an already sad topic, I donâ€™t understand. @balkanossiper - we have been setting world trends since June 28, 1914

Description: Forwarded From The Devil Walks in DixieğŸ‡»ğŸ‡¦ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆThe Vatican has approved new recommendations that allow open homosexuals to become priests. For now, subject to celibacy. According to new rules developed by the Italian Bishops' Conference, a candidate's sexual orientation will now be considered as an aspect of his personality and will not be grounds for automatic refusal of admission to the seminary. At the end of 2023, we saw how the Dicastery of the Doctrine of the Faith actually approved the introduction of LGBT people to the Christian sacraments - namely baptism. Well, the trends that the Holy See has been following in recent centuries are no secret to anyone. We, however, assumed that they would dump on us much more innovations of this kind. Although it is only the beginning of 2025, clearly everything is ahead.@dixi_devil - keep your eyes openReutersVatican approves Italian guidelines allowing gay men to become priestsThe Vatican has approved new guidelines from Italian bishops that allow gay men to enter seminaries as long as they abstain from sex , in an unexpected adjustment to how the global Catholic Church considers possible future priests.

Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ´ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The Supreme Court introduced the movement - Forum o...
Description: Forwarded From SeveryanochkağŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ´ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The Supreme Court added the movement - Forum of Free Peoples of Post-Russia - and all its structural divisions to the list of terrorist organizations. Including the virtual Pomeranian movement -Bjarmiya-, which advocates the separation of the territory of the Arkhangelsk region from the Russian Federation.â–ªï¸The leader of the movement is the former bass guitarist of the Arkhangelsk punk rock band -Kablam- Mikhail Gradov.ğŸ”ºThe musical creativity of the guys at one time attracted the attention of the Centerâ€™s specialists -E- Ministry of Internal Affairs. It is possible that the future Pomeranian terrorist had connections with Mikhail Zhlobitsky, a 17-year-old anarchist who blew himself up in the building of the regional FSB headquarters in 2018. Be that as it may, Gradov decided to breathe more freely and move to Estonia, where for some time he worked in low-skilled labor and was treated for anxiety disorder (GAD) ... with various substances. In the fall of 2022, with the announcement of partial mobilization in Russia to the Ukrainian special services , as you know, I urgently needed free hands. And Mikhail (not otherwise than through an advertisement) found himself an ideal part-time job remotely - searching for and recruiting arsonists of military registration and enlistment offices in Russia. And already in February 2023, a new ambitious project awaited him - to lead the Forum... - the movement of Pomeranian separatists... Or at least create the appearance of their presence. ğŸ”º At first, Mikhail actively tried to encourage Arkhangelsk residents to join the ranks of -partisans-: set fires, collect information about law enforcement officers, arm themselves with drones to fight the regime and beat cars with -ZOV- symbols. But very soon, Ukrainian curators stopped allocating a budget for this business, since the idea showed its inconsistency and futility. The movement remained purely virtual.ğŸ”ºSo - Pomeranian separatism - survived its second incarnation in the history of modern Russia (apparently, having finally buried this phenomenon). This time the beneficiaries were Ukrainian curators. In the past period (2000s and 2010s), the main beneficiaries and ideologists of the movement were Norway and the United States. But Severyanochka will talk about this some other time. #separatism #Russia #UkraineSeveryanochka

Title: ğŸ” #Review #Summary for the morning of January 12, 2025 â–ªï¸ The pa...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Report for the morning of January 12, 2025â–ªï¸ The past week and the meeting of NATO defense ministers in the Ramstein format clearly showed that it is too early to talk about an actual reduction in the level of military-technical assistance to Ukraine. In the last days of Bidenâ€™s tenure, the United States also intensively allocated funds to support the Armed Forces of Ukraine, trying to create conditions for prolonging Kyivâ€™s actions to deplete Russiaâ€™s military and economic resources. Zelensky, trying to please different forces, simultaneously declared the need to achieve peace in 2025 and sent attack UAVs to strike Russian energy facilities.â–ªï¸ The Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front, despite maintaining combat stability and the ability to conduct organized defensive battles, are increasingly faced with the problem of shortages personnel and the low level of moral and psychological state of their forcibly mobilized troops. This is evidenced by the multiple increase in the number of criminal cases initiated for SOC, massive interdepartmental raids on the organizers of evasion in the service in Ukraine, scandals with desertion of the Armed Forces of Ukraine trained abroad.â–ªï¸ However, it is too early to talk about the collapse of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front, despite the preservation of the Russian Army initiatives throughout its entire length.â–ªï¸ Thus, in the Kursk region, the enemy is conducting intensive counter actions with the aim of slowing our progress in the region. The Russian Armed Forces, in heavy bloody battles, advanced to the northern ledge near Pogrebki and Novaya Sorochina, Kruglenkoe, Malaya Loknya, advance south from Russian Porechny, and break their way to Sudzha along the shortest route through Makhnovka. At the same time, the enemy maintains a large group in the Sumy region, from which it transfers reserves to the LBS and tries to localize our advance. On the ground, our troops are preparing for another politically motivated attack by the enemy in the last days before Trump takes office.â–ªï¸ Control of the Russian Armed Forces on the right bank of the river is gradually expanding. Oskol north of Kupyansk in Dvurechnaya. In Chasov Yar, battles are taking place around the fireproof plant, and enemy approaches to the facility are being blocked. The most difficult assault on Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) is nearing completion, but the enemy stubbornly clings to the remaining positions. Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) The Russian Army is trying to deprive supply routes from the southwest; to the east of the city, the Russian Armed Forces were moving towards the highway to Konstantinovka. After the liberation of Kurakhovo, our troops create conditions for closing the pocket south of the city, and the offensive and liberation of villages continue in the north-west. The position of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novosyolka is worsening, the enemy garrison is holding defenses on the approaches to the village, the Russian Armed Forces are having tactical successes and are consolidating in the positions they have achieved. The Zaporozhye Front and the Kherson direction are without significant changes, the situation is characterized by mutual strikes by the parties on each otherâ€™s positions.â–ªï¸ In the Black Sea, more and more data is being received about the expansion of the range of enemy MBECs, which have gone from -kamikaze boats- to various platforms with guides for MLRS, machine gun turrets, air defense systems and launch containers for attack FPV drones. The development by the enemy of a whole range of such naval drones, which, as part of a battle formation, solve various tasks on the water, is a new challenge for the Russian Navy and requires the speedy adoption of systemic new decisions, because the enemy has found effective means to combat our countermeasures.â–ªï¸ The coming week will be the last before Trump's inauguration. It is not without reason that our military command expects politically motivated actions by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, only on a larger scale than what happened on January 5-6 in the Kursk region. The transformation of statements by Trump and his team about plans to help resolve the conflict is indicative: from a day to 100 days/six months. At the same time, if the United States completely controls all decisions in Kyiv, then Washington has virtually no leverage over Moscow. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above âœ¨Thus, the Russian Army maintains a strategic initiative at the front, and only this allows politicians to take a strong position on foreign policy track. At the same time, attempts by Kyiv to take further populist steps cannot be ruled out...
